name: messaging-provider-teams
description: Provider-core Microsoft Teams messaging provider (Graph send).

secret_requirements.name: MS_GRAPH_TENANT_ID
secret_requirements.description: Azure AD / Entra ID tenant (directory) ID.

secret_requirements.name: MS_GRAPH_CLIENT_ID
secret_requirements.description: Application (client) ID from Azure app registration.

secret_requirements.name: MS_GRAPH_CLIENT_SECRET
secret_requirements.description: Client secret used for client_credentials or refresh flows.

secret_requirements.name: MS_GRAPH_REFRESH_TOKEN
secret_requirements.description: Refresh token used when auth_mode selects refresh_token grant.
